question.questionText: Denise made a circuit to light a bulb or run a motor. She used a special switch. Below is the schematic diagram of her circuit. The switch is inside the dotted box. What will happen when she moves the switch to the left?

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: The light bulb will turn on.
The light bulb will light up.
When she moves the switch to the left the bulb will light.
